text: Cebu's 6th congressional district is one of the seven congressional districts of the Philippines in the province of Cebu. It has been represented in the House of Representatives of the Philippines since 1916 and earlier in the Philippine Assembly from 1907 to 1916. The district consists of the city of Mandaue and adjacent municipalities of Consolacion and Cordova. It is currently represented in the 18th Congress by Emmarie M.
